channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1461797581340692489
item.description: EMA da luz verde a los países miembros para autorización de uso de emergencia de molnupiravir - en paralelo se sigue procedimiento de autorización de comercialización. Se acelera el procedimiento de agencias antiviral oral y mientras seguimos sin datos abiertos 🤔 https://t.co/adwUuoHSXL

item.title: #es @ 1461774190273572867
item.description: Según la investigación, desde AGO2020 hasta NOV2020, buscaron portales de votantes estatales y de uno de ellos (de #DatosAbiertos, disponibles para consultar y usar) descargaron información sobre más de 100.000 personas.

item.title: #en @ 1461762078126055428
item.description:
I made an automated dataset that checks the NYC open data portal to determine which datasets were updated yesterday.
It runs every 24 hours and will keep itself fresh. Take a look 👀
https://t.co/DATAa0YgDJ https://t.co/zVzSVyhH4m

item.title: #en @ 1461760546836037635
item.description:
It's a late one today after a busy day at the Ministry...
The theme for day 19 of the #30DayMapChallenge is Islands so here is a map of all the locations mentioned in the smash hit 'Island' by @peatanddiesel. Outlines from @OrdnanceSurvey Boundary-Line #OpenData #MadeInQGIS https://t.co/NoqqLE9tzu

item.title: #es @ 1461756931060776962
#fr @ 1461753093213802496
item.description: L'Open Data de la Mairie de Paris montre clairement l'explosion des plaintes liées aux #TerrassesEstivales sur les deux dernières années. Plébiscite de #DMR : le premier semestre 2021 est supérieur de 50% à l'année 2020 ENTIERE ! Bonne gestion et maîtrise du RET ! https://t.co/vegAPaQ1pR

item.title: #en @ 1461742360115752963
item.description: Today's my last day at Mapbox. It's been a joy to explore the world with satellite imagery and virtually visit the United States, Denmark, France, Switzerland, the Netherlands, Portugal, Germany, Austria, Luxembourg, and Spain through open data, supported by my stellar teammates. https://t.co/PGd7p5ZDqG

📱Check your device 🇪🇺🛰️ https://t.co/NgaGBjmyJQ

item.title: #fr @ 1461636848011423744
item.description: @BFMTV Qu’est-ce qui peut justifier des mesures pareilles ? Ce n’est clairement pas basé sur toutes les données publiques que nous avons sur la pandémie… On nous cache quelque-chose et ce serait utile de savoir pourquoi. Maintenir les populations dans le flou est absurde ou calculé.

item.title: #fr @ 1461635909334487041
item.description: @Mediavenir Qu’est-ce qui peut justifier des mesures pareilles ? item.description:
As was said months ago. For some reason we continue to build delays in data metrics here in #Germany.
#Corona data, open data, vaccinations, child vaccinations, hospital data, registered deaths.
Political? Technological? Ideological? Either way, no way to deal with disasters. https://t.co/ONQm2k2vby

item.title: #es @ 1461369788869926918
item.description:

A nivel Latinoamérica aún falta mucho por hacer. Entendamos: el actor principal de la democracia es el ciudadano

item.title: #es @ 1461140810607566849
item.description:
¿Efecto Post #halloween2021 🇵🇪 ? #Covid_19 #DatosAbiertos A escala nacional: Promedio diario de casos de 740 a 1,000 en dos semanas. Siendo más notorio en las pruebas moleculares: de 280 a 460 en el mismo período, y la positividad lentamente de 2% a 3%
#NoBajemosLaGuardia https://t.co/9rkoPc8Xl7

item.title: #en @ 1461056812929617922
item.description: .@dallasnews is doing an occasional series on the Dallas police department's removal of public information from the open data portal. The death of Tony Timpa and how hard @caryaspinwall worked to find the truth is a story everyone in this city should know. https://t.co/nNsDy0W4s6
